entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
